verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

translations.text: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people ˹saying to him˺, “Warn your people before a painful punishment comes to them.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna arsalna noohan ilaqawmihi an anthir qawmaka min qabli an ya/tiyahum AAathabunaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: Noah proclaimed, “O my people! I am truly sent to you with a clear warning:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ya qawmi innee lakum natheerunmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ

translations.text: worship Allah ˹alone˺, fear Him, and obey me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ani oAAbudoo Allaha wattaqoohuwaateeAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: He will forgive your sins, and delay your end until the appointed time.<sup foot_note=77552>1</sup> Indeed, when the time set by Allah comes, it cannot be delayed, if only you knew!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yaghfir lakum min thunoobikumwayu-akhkhirkum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala Allahiitha jaa la yu-akhkharu law kuntumtaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا

translations.text: He cried, “My Lord! I have surely called my people day and night,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi innee daAAawtu qawmeelaylan wanahara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًا

translations.text: but my calls only made them run farther away.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falam yazidhum duAAa-ee illafirara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًا

translations.text: And whenever I invite them to be forgiven by You, they press their fingers into their ears, cover themselves with their clothes, persist ˹in denial˺, and act very arrogantly.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innee kullama daAAawtuhumlitaghfira lahum jaAAaloo asabiAAahum fee athanihimwastaghshaw thiyabahum waasarroo wastakbarooistikbara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا

translations.text: Then I certainly called them openly,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma innee daAAawtuhum jihara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا

translations.text: then I surely preached to them publicly and privately,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma innee aAAlantu lahum waasrartu lahumisrara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا

translations.text: saying, ‘Seek your Lord’s forgiveness, ˹for˺ He is truly Most Forgiving.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kanaghaffara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا

translations.text: He will shower you with abundant rain,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yursili assamaa AAalaykummidrara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَـٰرًا

translations.text: supply you with wealth and children, and give you gardens as well as rivers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayumdidkum bi-amwalin wabaneenawayajAAal lakum jannatin wayajAAal lakum anhara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا

translations.text: What is the matter with you that you are not in awe of the Majesty of Allah,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma lakum la tarjoona lillahiwaqara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا

translations.text: when He truly created you in stages ˹of development˺?<sup foot_note=77553>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqad khalaqakum atwara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا

translations.text: Do you not see how Allah created seven heavens, one above the other,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alam taraw kayfa khalaqa AllahusabAAa samawatin tibaqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا

translations.text: placing the moon within them as a ˹reflected˺ light, and the sun as a ˹radiant˺ lamp?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAala alqamara feehinna nooran wajaAAalaashshamsa siraja
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا

translations.text: Allah ˹alone˺ caused you<sup foot_note=77554>1</sup> to grow from the earth like a plant.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallahu anbatakum mina al-ardinabata
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا

translations.text: Then He will return you to it, and then simply bring you forth ˹again˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma yuAAeedukum feehawayukhrijukum ikhraja
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا

translations.text: And Allah ˹alone˺ spread out the earth for you
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallahu jaAAala lakumu al-ardabisata
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا

translations.text: to walk along its spacious pathways.’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Litaslukoo minha subulan fijaja
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًا

translations.text: ˹Eventually,˺ Noah cried, “My Lord! They have certainly persisted in disobeying me, and followed ˹instead˺ those ˹elite˺ whose ˹abundant˺ wealth and children only increase them in loss,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala noohun rabbi innahum AAasawneewattabaAAoo man lam yazidhu maluhu wawaladuhu illakhasara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا

translations.text: and who have devised a tremendous plot,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wamakaroo makran kubbara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا

translations.text: urging ˹their followers˺, ‘Do not abandon your idols—especially Wadd, Suwâ’, Yaghûth, Ya’ûq, and Nasr.’<sup foot_note=77555>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo la tatharunna alihatakumwala tatharunna waddan wala suwaAAanwala yaghootha wayaAAooqa wanasra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلًا

translations.text: Those ˹elite˺ have already led many astray. So ˹O Lord˺, only allow the wrongdoers to stray farther away.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqad adalloo katheeran walatazidi aththalimeena illa dalala
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا

translations.text: So because of their sins, they were drowned, then admitted into the Fire. And they found none to help them against Allah.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Mimma khatee-atihimoghriqoo faodkhiloo naran falam yajidoo lahum min dooniAllahi ansara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

translations.text: Noah had prayed, “My Lord! Do not leave a single disbeliever on earth.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqala noohun rabbi latathar AAala al-ardi mina alkafireenadayyara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا

translations.text: For if You spare ˹any of˺ them, they will certainly mislead Your servants, and give birth only to ˹wicked˺ sinners, staunch disbelievers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innaka in tatharhum yudillooAAibadaka wala yalidoo illa fajirankaffara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا

translations.text: My Lord! Forgive me, my parents, and whoever enters my house in faith, and ˹all˺ believing men and women. And increase the wrongdoers only in destruction.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbi ighfir lee waliwalidayyawaliman dakhala baytiya mu/minan walilmu/mineena walmu/minatiwala tazidi aththalimeena illatabaran
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
